name: mcp-think_clear_thoughts
description: Clear all recorded thoughts from the current session. Use this to start fresh if the thinking process needs to be reset.

name: mcp-think_get_thought_stats
description: Get statistics about the thoughts recorded in the current session.

name: mcp-think_get_thoughts
description: Retrieve all thoughts recorded in the current session. This tool helps review the thinking process that has occurred so far.

name: mcp-think_think
description: Use this tool to think about something. It will not obtain new information or change anything, but just append the thought to the log. Use it when complex reasoning or cache memory is needed.

thought.description: A thought to think about. This can be structured reasoning, step-by-step analysis, policy verification, or any other mental process that helps with problem-solving.
